desc: Authentic, vintage Moroccan rugs, & new, handmade, contemporary rugs. We have a wide selection of Beni Ourain's, Azilal, Boujad & Boucherouite rugs. Beautifully hand-woven by the precious hands of women from Berber Tribes in the Atlas Mountains of Morocco, championing fairtrade & sustainable 100% natural raw materials.

layout.text: Sourced directly from villages across Morocco, we stock a wide range of hand picked vintage Beni Ourain, Boujad and Azilal rugs. Guaranteed 100% authenticity and the best quality.
